resources.string:
The numerical version of the game is played with 4 digits. Computer generated a 4-digit secret number. The digits must be all different. Then, in turn, the players try to guess their opponent's number who gives the number of matches. If the matching digits are on their right positions, they are "bulls", if on different positions, they are "cows". 
	Example: 
	Secret number: 4271 
	Opponent's try: 1234 
	Answer: 1 bull and 2 cows. (The bull is "2", the cows are"4" and "1".) 
	The word version of the game is exactly like the numerical version except instead of 4-digit numbers, 4-letter words are used.
